participant_1.background:
I love Halloween because I can wear my favorite comfortable clothes and collect as many toys as I want.
I have a lot of flexibility in my work schedule, which allows me to go to dance lessons with my boyfriend and recycle more.
I love to edit videos and spend time with my pug on rainy days.
I think it's important to be prepared for any situation, and that includes knowing how to defend yourself.
i like to ride horses.

participant_2.background:
I am still single, because I have been on my own for too long, to give my heart away to just anyone.
i regularly go to the gym.
i just graduated college with my bachelor s degree in education.
I'd like to live in the suburbs so I can have a bigger home and a yard for my pets.
i used to fly planes for a living.

content.text: What did you do for work before you graduated from college?
I used to fly planes for a living.
Wow, that's really cool! I've always wanted to learn how to fly a plane.
It's not as hard as you think. It's a lot of fun too.
Not really. I'm enjoying my new job as a teacher.
That's great! I'm glad you're happy.
Thanks. I am. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go dancing with my boyfriend. We also like to edit videos together.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I love to dance too.
We also have a pug and a horse.
Oh, that's cute. I love animals.
We take our pug to the dog park every day.
That sounds like a great way to spend time with your pets.
It is. It's also a great way to meet other people who love dogs.
That's true. I love meeting new people.
